archimate:DataObject.name: InstalledSoftware
archimate:DataObject.documentation: An InstalledSoftware (renaming the Software concept from previous releases) consists of encoded information or computer instructions deployed on a machine such that it can be executed. An InstalledSoftware is a SoftwareSpecification deployed using the SoftwareSupportPackage on platform which meets the HostingPlatformRequirements. Each InstalledSoftware specifies their input and output respectively with SoftConnectionPoints. Software may be nested within other software; thereby creating a containment relationship.
